fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Slowed Discussion (2-shot): Use during the night. The next day, all players are on a 1 minute slowmode.
~ Subtle Influence (2-shot): Use during the the night. The next day, all Agents have a lynch threshold one vote higher than majority.
~ Harsh Spotlight (2-shot): Use during the night. The next day, only Agents may use day abilities. (Votes and Whispers do not count as day abilities for this ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: ~ You are capable of multitasking, but you may not multitask the factional kill.
